title.value: Определение иммунизирующей дозы вакцины инактивированной эмульгированной для профилактики колибактериоза, сальмонеллеза, клебсиеллеза и протеоза крупного рогатого скота
Definition of immunizing dose of inactivated emulsified vaccine for the prevention of colibacillosis, salmonellosis, klebsiella and proteose of cattle

journal.title: Epizootiology, Immunobiology, Pharmacology, Sanitary Science : international scientific and practical journal

person.name: Karpovich,V.K., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breding (Belarus). The S.N. Vyshelesskij Inst. of Experimental Veterinary Medicine

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there was presented results of determination of the optimal immunizing dose of inactivated emulsified vaccine to prevent cattle colibacillosis, salmonellosis, klebsiellosis аnd proteosis on productive animals are resulted. In the study there was determined the optimal immunizing dose of the biological preparation. Rationality of application of а vaccine in а dose of 2 cubic centimeters for pregnant cows аnd 1 cubic centimeter for calves is shown. In course of the study there were shown titres of antobodied in blood serum of calves, as well as the level post-vaccination antibodies in blood serum.
